text:
Creating a feature that would allow HubDB to be added to an account as an add on service.

We have a lot of clients who would benefit from hubdb but can’t justify the price increase to have it. Creating an add-on service for these accounts would increase HubSpot’s revenue and keep me from banging my head off my desk when certain requests come in. Win win.

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Create-an-addon-for-Hubdb/idi-p/773860#M139182>
(HubSpot PM here) - HubDb comes along with CMS Hub today, which Hubs would you like to have it as an add-on, and what would you use it for?
Hi Sejal! Thanks for reaching out. The problem that we face is that some of our clients are on marketing Pro but CMS starter and it’s the appropriate level given their needs.
Ironically we'd get more use out of it on Sales Hub Enterprise than out of CMS Hub

I don't know where to post this, but the current data quality suggestions menu is, while a great concept, very unhelpful for our use case (millions of contacts, contacts created via Zendesk integration)

Reason is that it has about 250,000 suggestions

But I can only batch select 10 at a time (50 if I change the max shown on screen).

At 5 seconds per 50 that works out to somewhere between 6 and 8 hours straight of work to just accept all of the changes.

Ideal state: select all option, just the same as contacts and companies, and lists have

Also, we use an internal property "SPID" for contacts AND companies, but there is no way to set this as an automatic deduplication property.

This would be very helpful if we could select an automatic deduplication/merge/update property rather than the default (email, domain)
